mapper.select: SELECT t.`DETAIL_ID` AS detailId, t.`CONTENT`, t.`RANK` FROM basis_tb_resume_detail t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.resume_id = #{resumeId} ORDER BY t.`RANK`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basis_tb_resume_detail ( RESUME_ID, CONTENT, RANK, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{resumeId}, #{content}, #{rank}, 'U', NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} )
